item.title: How to get started with the new MongoDB Java Driver
item.description: The second in my short series of blogs about the new Java driver is now available for your perusal. In it, there’s some guidance on how to get started using the new driver, whether you want to use the new (unfinished) API, the existing “classic” API, or a blend of both.
